amendment.description: Amendment sought to restore the requirement that the voucher program be evaluated using the strongest possible research design, thus limiting voucher students to no more than 50% of a school's total enrollment.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 2 printed in House Report 114-300 to restore the requirement that the voucher program be evaluated using the strongest possible research design, and would limit voucher students to no more than 50% of a school's total enrollment.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Norton amendment (A002) Failed by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Norton amendment (A002) Failed by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A002) offered by Ms. Norton.
